text: Paris School of Business (formerly the ESG Management School ) is a European business school. The school has two locations, one in Paris and one in Rennes, France. It was created in 1974. PSB offers degrees in the fields of economics, social sciences, luxury markets, arts and management. ==References== == Other websites == * PSB Paris School of Business (in English) Category:1974 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris Category:Rennes
title: Paris School of Business
